definition: low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline
lit. low tide/fig. the lowest point (e.g. of a relationship)

sentences.english: The setback was only temporary, however.
sentences.chinese: 但是這個低潮是短暫的。

sentences.english: A: What would say was the lowest point in your point?
sentences.chinese: 哪段日子可以算是你一生中最低潮的時光？

sentences.english: He also noticed that it happened at the very lowest and saddest times of His life.
sentences.chinese: 而這些剛好發生在他人生最低潮的時候。

sentences.english: At the end of last century , the Hong Kong film fell into low tide period again .
sentences.chinese: 上個世紀末，香港電影再次陷入低潮期。

sentences.english: This may lead to employee turnover at a most unfortunate time in the project.
sentences.chinese: 這會導致僱員們在項目的最低潮期時離職。

sentences.english: But he also did a couple of game-changing things during that exile.
sentences.chinese: 但他也在這段低潮時期做了幾件改變遊戲規則的事情。

sentences.english: Management doesn't bring that singular clarity of highs and lows.
sentences.chinese: 管理工作不會給你帶來這種單一而明確的高潮和低潮。

sentences.english: The low ebb hour that Chinese man fails in them, what expect a woman is placatory .
sentences.chinese: 中國男人在他們失敗的低潮時刻，則期盼女人的撫慰。

sentences.english: If I were you I would not find fault with the sea at low tide.
sentences.chinese: 假如我是你，我決不在低潮的時候去抱怨大海。

sentences.english: What would say was the lowest point in your point?
sentences.chinese: 哪段日子可以算是你一生中最低潮的時光？

sentences.english: But Abreu's struggles are just a small sample of the entire team's struggles.
sentences.chinese: 但是阿布的低潮看來只是整個球隊的一小縮影。

sentences.english: Her biorhythms were at their lowest ebb.
sentences.chinese: 她的生物週期正處最低潮。

sentences.english: On February meteors and 2 is brought under.
sentences.chinese: 上2月流星和2個天下是低潮期。

sentences.english: Choosing such a tide , I hoped for a glimpse of the pool.
sentences.chinese: 我選好這樣一個低潮的時機，希望能看一眼水潭。

sentences.english: But the verse is equally applicable to agonies of spirit in the midst of life.
sentences.chinese: 然而，這經文也同樣適用於靈性低潮的苦境。

sentences.english: A second-time breaking diplomatic war once again brought Russian-British relations into low tide.
sentences.chinese: 再次爆發的外交戰，使兩國關係再次陷入低潮。

definition: valley/trough (as opposed to peaks)/fig. low point/lowest ebb/nadir of one's fortunes
setback/reverse/check/defeat/frustration/disappointment/to frustrate/to discourage/to set sb back/to blunt/to subdue
one stumble, unable to rise (idiom); a setback leading to total collapse/ruined at a stroke/unable to recover after a minor hitch
(of market prices etc) to rapidly fluctuate (idiom)/volatile/significant ups and downs/roller coaster
to bestir oneself/to pull oneself together/to cheer up/to uplift/to stimulate
to sink into (vice, depravity etc)/to pass into oblivion/downfall/passing
to pace back and forth/to hesitate/to be indecisive
to lose one's love/to break up (in a romantic relationship)/to feel jilted
